item.title: Build and Install Wireshark
item.description: Wireshark is a great tool for analyzing traffic, whether it could be live traffic on the interface or the .cap file. The tool enables different types of filtering on packets like follow a stream, filter by protocol and IP, etc In order to install the latest version of Wireshark on Linux, one should build and install it from the source. Sometimes, building from a source is difficult because we have to hunt down the dependencies.
